descriptionHtml:
-----------------------------------
The Halls of Glory - Rissgard
-----------------------------------

One of my mods for Skyrim. - early Alpha State.
This mod adds a huge "Dungeon"/"Sovengard like Interior" to Skyrim.
Because of its Alpha State there is currently no Navmesh. I leave this here on the nexus
so that somebody might want to work further on it or help me with this mod.



Requirement
=========
Just Skyrim (No DLC required)


Install
=========
Just install it, suscribe it, endorse it.

Alpha Entrance is at the backside of the Battleborn House in Whiterun.
Look Screenshots.


Enjoy!!
(Oh if someone wants to make a better version, just go ahead and send it to me via nexus and i will upload it.)

Should be compatible with all Skyrim Versions and Languages.




Credits
=========
Thanks to Bethesda for the best games.


Knowing Issuise/Bugs
=========
No bugs known jet.
Glitches because of its unfinished state.



=== CHANGELOG ===

version Alpha 1
- Initial release
author: mach1991
